description: System-generated unique identifier for this contact–general ledger account association record.
Identifier of the general ledger account assigned to the contact for postings; likely references the GL account master.
Identifier of the contact (person or organization) linked to this GL account; likely references the contact master record.
Flag indicating whether this is the contact’s primary/default GL account used for automatic postings (1=yes, 0=no).
Free-text notes about the contact–account relationship, such as special billing or posting instructions.
System-maintained timestamp when the record was last updated; may duplicate another modified timestamp field (confirm with SME).
Likely the timestamp of the last user-driven update; field name suggests a user ID but stored values are datetimes (confirm with SME).
User ID of the person or process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User ID of the person or process that last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user.
